ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: It is a bug of a sort. Here is what happens: Lets say a quest requires 3 items (X, Y, & Z).  Player 1 gives the NPC items X, Y, and a third item that is
ygData.messageBody:
It is a bug of a sort. Here is what happens: Lets say a quest requires 3
items (X, Y, & Z). Player 1 gives the NPC items X, Y, and a third item that
is incorrect. Swears up & down at his bad fortune and stomps off. Player 2
comes up and gives the NPC item Z and gets the goods, and since she also
gave the NPC items X & Y gets the "you have something else for me?" message.

Rokenn


>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
>Date: Wed, 5 Jan 2000 09:09:22 -1000
>
>I completed the lambent breastplate quest the other day. When I gave the
>quest components to Cyrissia (sp?), I got the breastplate, faction change
>messages, experience gain message, etc. I then noticed on the next line
>in
>the text window a message from Cyrissia saying "Aren't you forgetting
>something?". None of the words were bracketed as a key word/phrase. I
>tried replying with variations of "What am I forgetting?" but got no
>further
>response from her. Was wondering if this was just a bug or if there might
>possibly something else I could have given her?
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>30 bard
